event.title: Fellowship meeting in Vienna
event.body:
The second Austrian Fellowship meeting takes place on 13 January starting at 18:00 in Vienna in the Otto-Wagner Pavillion near Karlsplatz in the side room upstairs, right hand from the staircase.
Like last time, Karin Kosina and Reinhard MÃ¼ller will inform about FSFE's work, and we expect interesting discussions. A major discussion point this time will be "Free Software in education".
This invitation addresses to all people interested in FSFE or Free Software.
